Uses of Class
hotelchain.Room

    • Uses of Room in hotelchain

      Subclasses of Room in hotelchain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BridalSuite
      Represents a Bridal Suite, a specific type of hotel Room containing a kingsize bed, accommodating 2 occupants.
      class  DoubleRoom
      Represents a specific type of a Room containing two beds.
      class  FamilySuite
      Represents a specific type of a Room containing one queensize and two single beds, accommodating 4 occupants.
      class  KingsizeRoom
      Represents a specific type of a Room containing a kingsize bed, accommodating 2 occupants.
      class  QueensizeRoom
      Represents a specific type of a Room containing a queensize bed, accommodating 2 occupants.
      class  SingleRoom
      Represents a specific type of a Room containing a single bed.
      Fields in hotelchain with type parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Room> Hotel.hotelRooms 
      Methods in hotelchain with parameters of type Room 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Hotel.addRoom(Room room)
      Adds a given room to the list of rooms in this Hotel.
